leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 神经科学-电生理与神经信号生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 预处理→事件/分选→解码→实时→评测
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 实时系统 + 分析库 + GUI

queries: [WEB] neural recording ground truth generation github

tools.name: APPIAN
tools.one_line_profile: Automated pipeline for PET/MRI kinetic data analysis
tools.detailed_description: APPIAN is an open-source automated software pipeline designed to facilitate the analysis of PET images in conjunction with MRI. It simplifies PET tracer kinetic data analysis for users with moderate computing skills and supports reproducible research in medical imaging.

tools.name: aind-ephys-spikesort-kilosort25-full
tools.one_line_profile: CodeOcean capsule for electrophysiology spike sorting pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A full electrophysiology analysis pipeline capsule using Kilosort2.5 via SpikeInterface, designed for reproducible spike sorting workflows on CodeOcean.

tools.name: dmipy
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for diffusion MRI-based microstructure estimation
tools.detailed_description: An open-source toolbox for reproducible diffusion MRI-based microstructure estimation, providing a framework for modeling and analyzing dMRI data.

tools.name: BEETL
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarks for EEG Transfer Learning
tools.detailed_description: BEETL (Benchmarks for EEG Transfer Learning) provides a framework and datasets for benchmarking transfer learning algorithms on EEG data, facilitating the development and comparison of BCI models.

tools.name: warpAnnotations
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for transforming annotations between spatial datasets
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to transform annotations (such as points, skeletons, or meshes) between different spatial datasets, useful in connectomics and spatial biology.

tools.name: Dung-Beetle-Optimizer
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Dung Beetle Optimizer algorithm
tools.detailed_description: Matlab and Python implementation of the Dung Beetle Optimizer (DBO), a metaheuristic optimization algorithm used for solving optimization problems in various scientific and engineering domains.

tools.name: STEEGFormer
tools.one_line_profile: Fair EEG BCI benchmark framework and foundation model
tools.detailed_description: A fair EEG BCI benchmark framework accompanied by STEEGFormer, a simple yet powerful foundation model for Spatio-Temporal EEG analysis.

tools.name: spyglass
tools.one_line_profile: Neuroscience data analysis framework for reproducible research
tools.detailed_description: A neuroscience data analysis framework built by the Loren Frank Lab at UCSF, designed to support reproducible systems neuroscience research and data management.

tools.name: neurobench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark harness for neuromorphic computing algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark harness and baseline results for the NeuroBench algorithm track, facilitating the evaluation of neuromorphic computing models and algorithms.

tools.name: moabb
tools.one_line_profile: Mother of All BCI Benchmarks
tools.detailed_description: MOABB (Mother of All BCI Benchmarks) is a comprehensive benchmarking framework for Brain-Computer Interfaces (BCI), aiming to build a large-scale benchmark of BCI algorithms on many datasets.

tools.name: mrQA
tools.one_line_profile: Quality assurance tools for medical imaging datasets
tools.detailed_description: mrQA provides tools for quality assurance in medical imaging datasets, specifically checking for protocol compliance and consistency across MRI data.

tools.name: OpenNeuro
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for analyzing and sharing neuroimaging data
tools.detailed_description: OpenNeuro is a free and open platform for sharing, archiving, and analyzing neuroimaging data, supporting BIDS standard datasets.

tools.name: Matilda
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-task framework for single-cell multimodal omics learning
tools.detailed_description: Matilda is a multi-task framework designed for learning from single-cell multimodal omics data. It leverages multi-modality to perform tasks such as data simulation, dimension reduction, visualization, classification, and feature selection.

tools.name: CuBIDS
tools.one_line_profile: Software for curation and processing of BIDS datasets
tools.detailed_description: CuBIDS (Curation of BIDS) is a software package designed to help users curate and process BIDS (Brain Imaging Data Structure) datasets, ensuring data integrity and facilitating preprocessing.

tools.name: StitchIt
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for stitching large tiled microscopy datasets
tools.detailed_description: StitchIt is a tool designed for the stitching of large tiled datasets, commonly used in advanced microscopy to reconstruct large field-of-view images.

tools.name: MEArec
tools.one_line_profile: Simulator for extracellular recordings on MEA
tools.detailed_description: MEArec is a fast and customizable simulator for extracellular recordings on Micro-Electrode Arrays (MEA), enabling the generation of synthetic ground-truth data for spike sorting validation.

tools.name: SpikeInterface
tools.one_line_profile: Unified framework for spike sorting pipelines
tools.detailed_description: SpikeInterface is a Python-based module that provides a unified interface for creating flexible and robust spike sorting pipelines, wrapping multiple sorters and processing tools.

tools.name: ViSAPy
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for generating benchmark data to evaluate spike sorting methods
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to generate synthetic benchmark data for the evaluation and validation of spike sorting algorithms, facilitating the development of neurophysiological data analysis tools.

tools.name: SpikeForest
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking system for spike sorting algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking system designed to evaluate the performance of various spike sorting algorithms against ground-truth datasets, providing a standardized framework for algorithm comparison.

tools.name: SpikeForest2
tools.one_line_profile: Version 2 of the SpikeForest spike sorting benchmarking analysis system
tools.detailed_description: The second version of the SpikeForest system, providing updated analysis tools and web-based visualization components for benchmarking spike sorting algorithms.

tools.name: bcisimulator
tools.one_line_profile: Closed-loop BCI simulator for testing real-time neural decoding algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A simulation framework designed to test and benchmark real-time neural decoding algorithms in a closed-loop Brain-Computer Interface (BCI) setting, allowing for algorithm validation without live subjects.

tools.name: MNE-BIDS
tools.one_line_profile: BIDS-compatible dataset IO and management for MNE-Python
tools.detailed_description: MNE-BIDS is a Python package that facilitates the reading and writing of electrophysiological data (EEG, MEG, iEEG) in the Brain Imaging Data Structure (BIDS) format, integrating seamlessly with the MNE-Python analysis ecosystem.

tools.name: MNE-BIDS-Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Automated processing pipeline for MNE-BIDS datasets
tools.detailed_description: A full-featured pipeline for processing electrophysiological data (MEG, EEG) formatted according to BIDS. It provides automated preprocessing, epoching, and analysis workflows based on MNE-Python best practices.

tools.name: coconatfly
tools.one_line_profile: Comparative connectomics tool for Drosophila datasets
tools.detailed_description: Part of the natverse ecosystem, this R package facilitates the comparative analysis of connectomics data across public and in-progress Drosophila datasets, enabling retrieval and comparison of neuronal connectivity.

tools.name: photon-mosaic
tools.one_line_profile: Automated analysis pipeline for multiphoton imaging
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed for the automated and reproducible analysis of multiphoton imaging datasets, facilitating the processing of large-scale calcium imaging or structural imaging data.

tools.name: multipy
tools.one_line_profile: Multiple hypothesis testing library for Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing various methods for controlling the family-wise error rate (FWER) and false discovery rate (FDR) in multiple hypothesis testing, commonly used in neuroimaging and statistical analysis.

tools.name: psychopy_ext
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for reproducible behavioral neuroscience experiments
tools.detailed_description: An extension framework for PsychoPy designed to facilitate rapid, reproducible design, analysis, and plotting of experiments in behavioral neuroscience and psychology.

tools.name: SIFT
tools.one_line_profile: Source Information Flow Toolbox for EEGLAB
tools.detailed_description: An EEGLAB-compatible toolbox for analyzing and visualizing multivariate causality and information flow between sources of electrophysiological activity (EEG/ECoG/MEG), supporting model fitting, connectivity estimation, and statistical analysis.

tools.name: eyeris
tools.one_line_profile: Reproducible pupillometry preprocessing and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A CRAN-published R package providing tools for BIDS-compliant preprocessing, automated quality control, and analysis of pupillometry data.

tools.name: TorchEEG
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch-based library for EEG signal analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library built on PyTorch for EEG signal analysis, providing datasets, transforms, and deep learning models specifically designed for electroencephalography tasks.

tools.name: TtoZ
tools.one_line_profile: Convert T-score brain maps to Z-score maps
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool to convert neuroimaging statistical maps from T-scores to Z-scores, facilitating standardization and comparison of brain activation maps.
